title: Is it important to complete a school notebook when I am a 12th boards PCM student? Do they also have marks and shown to the examiner? - Quora
tags: Central Board of Secondary Education, India

response.answer_text: Hello, Practise makes your basics more strong. Question papers are based on NCERT only, so do practise of exercise questions and examples in your school notebook. This will also reduce your burden in case you have to show note book to your teacher. Well, it’s not like that the examiner check your school notebook. They check your practical files and your knowledge as well through Viva. Learn more and give your time so that you could get the best marks as these marks of Viva/ Practical help in increasing your percentage. Best of Luck! Hope, it helps!

I just say no, because 70 marks are obtained from main paper and rest 30 from practical.There is no need to submit notebook but I can say it very clearly it depends on school also that how they give internal assessment marks i.e 30 or 20 as per subject only on practical or also on notebook. So I suggest you should confirm it from your school.

No its not important but from my experience if you complete your notebook then it will be very helpful for 12th final exams…because they will teach you the derivation and all and trust me this will be very helpful for finals…
I think no…. because a school note can't decide ur future & school examiner can't give mark on the basis of school notebook.
